HeadStart | The Challenge
HeadStart needs you!
Become a HeadStart Ambassador
HeadStart invites you to become a HeadStart Ambassador!
About the role:
The role of HeadStart Ambassador is to be the face and story behind the programme. You will help corporates understand why the programme is important and guide current volunteers by answering their questions and sharing your experiences. Through this you will help promote and strengthen the HeadStart brand at launch events, workshops and corporate networking events at City Hall, London whilst building your own skills.
Availablity:
We ask you to commit to three or more 2-3 hour events between April and September 2015
***Deadline Friday 13th March***
Apply here
What’s in it for you ?
-Boost your CV by helping to develop a volunteering programme with a large national charity
-Gain public speaking skills and help your peers
-Get invited to exclusive events with politicians and corporate leaders
Be quick as there are only 20 places and roughly 400 of you!
If you have any questions please email headstart@the-challenge.org.
